long_description: This handy first aid kit has the essentials to take care of those unexpected cuts, scrapes and stings encountered along the trail. Kit includes 20 3 x 0.75 inch adhesive bandages, six antiseptic towelettes, sting relief pad and emergency whistle. Durable EVA foam case includes a carabiner to attach case to your pack or belt.
short_description: This handy first aid kit has the essentials to take care of those unexpected cuts, scrapes and stings encountered along the trail.
